plugins.prepareCmd: USERSCRIPT_VERSION=${nextRelease.version} npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v='${nextRelease.version}';const s=fs.readFileSync('dist/privacy-guard.user.js','utf8');if(!/^\/\/\s*@version\s+${nextRelease.version}/m.test(s)){throw new Error('Version mismatch in dist: expected '+v);}"
